title: Truffle cheesecake
ingredients: ['275g (10 oz) shortbread crumbs', '50g (2 oz) icing sugar', '5 tablespoons cocoa powder', '75g (3 oz) butter, softened', '350g (12 oz) plain chocolate chips', '2 (300g) tubs cream cheese', '400ml condensed sweetened milk', '4 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
